A Bit About Us

Our Infrastructure team sits at the core of the business and is responsible for the reliability and scalability of all the services that power the platforms and its developers. In only a few years, we have became the leading crypto-products trading platform worldwide, and handle ten of thousands low latency transactions per second, representing several billions of dollars traded every day. We specialize in systems, whether it be networking, the Linux kernel, or some more specific interest in scaling, algorithms, or distributed systems.



Why join us?


Pioneer the future of financial technology

Fast-track your career and personal growth

Enjoy best-in-class perks and benefits

Expand your knowledge with our generous education allowance

Work with our global team on an international scale

Job Details

Responsibilities

Design, build and maintain core infrastructure pieces that allow BitMEX scaling to quickly and as boringly as possible deploy new products and support hundreds of thousands of concurrent users - in several different geographies and infrastructure providers (e.g. AWS, GCP, bare-metal…), using Terraform, Kubernetes and Chef

Organize further planned failure scenario simulations and tabletops, and shepherd the organization into a culture of where chaos engineering is the norm

Unify, standardize and automate our incident response

Bring the firm to the next-level when it comes to incident response handling by crafting and evangelizing standardized procedures

Make cross-functional incident coordination, communication, investigation, and post-mortem tracking no-brainers through automation

Establish SLOs and Error Budgets standards for all public facing and internal services

Bring focus on how failures impact our global customer base by revamping our take on SLAs, and align teams within the new SLO framework

Implement a metric collection platform to automatically collect service level indicators for any service deployed to production to ease adoption

Debug production issues across services and levels of the stack

Make monitoring and alerting alert on symptoms and not on outages

Document every action so findings turn into repeatable actions–and then automation

Be on a Pager rotation to respond to the BitMEX platform availability incidents and provide support for

Qualifications

Think about systems - edge cases, failure modes, behaviors, specific implementations.

Have experience with Nginx, HAProxy, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, or similar technologies

6+ years of professional experience, with a proven track record of designing, implementing, managing, and testing infrastructure at scale on AWS for high value environments,

Strong engineering skill set with a firm grasp of fundamental Computer Science principles and a modular, maintainable, agile & test-driven approach to software development

Capacity to multitask and give equal attention to a variety of functions while under pressure

Strong technical troubleshooting, diagnosing and problem solving skills

Ability to adapt to changing priorities within a fast moving industry and startup culture

A Bachelor’s Degree Or Equivalent Work Experience Preferred
